column6: Magneto is on a one-man mission to safeguard the future of mutantkind by any means necessary. So far, he's done so by eliminating human threats… But what happens when it's MUTANTS who pose a threat to their own species? Will Magneto cross a line and raise his hand to his own kind? And if so, just how far will he go?
column8: | artist:Javier Fernandez Barranco | writer:Cullen Bunn | penciller (cover):Declan Shalvey
